doc.field: Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection
Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection

This series consists of 13 black and white prints made from the negatives in Series I. Most of the prints are of 7 different historic houses which belonged to various members of the Cortelyou and Bergen families in Brooklyn. One image is an undated portrait of Teunis Cortelyou. The images were taken ca. 1899-1913, and the prints were made much later. The houses, built during the 17th,18th and 19th centuries, have all since been demolished.
Cortelyou and Bergen houses photograph collection
